sentences: Paku on palgi läbimõõt peenemast otsast.
Võta üks paku ja too see siia.
context: The word 'paku' is the genitive singular form of Estonian noun 'pakk', meaning a beam, log or lumber piece. It refers to a wooden beam with smaller cross-section at one end. In construction and woodworking contexts, it would refer to such tapered wooden beams used for building structures.
